item.title: 福特汽车第二季度利润不佳，法兰克福股价下跌 8
item.description: 周四，在法兰克福上市的福特汽车股价暴跌 8%，此前这家底特律汽车制造商报告第二季度调整后利润下降。【原文：Ford Motor shares listed in Frankfurt plunged 8% on Thursday, after the Detroit automaker reported a drop in second-quarter adjusted profit.】

item.title: 现代汽车第二季度利润增长 23%，超出预期
item.description: 韩国现代汽车公司（Hyundai Motor Co）周四公布第二季度利润增长 23%，超出分析师预期，主要得益于有利的汇率和高利润运动型多用途车及混合动力车的稳健销售。【原文：South Korea's Hyundai Motor Co reported on Thursday a 23% rise in second-quarter profit that beat analysts expectations, helped by favourable exchange rates and solid sales of high-margin sport utility vehicles and hybrid cars.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司第二季度盈利因油价上涨而增长
item.description: 法国石油巨头道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）公布第二季度盈利增长 14.6%，低于分析师预期，原因是油价上涨提升了原油销售，抵消了成品油和天然气销售的疲软。【原文：French oil major TotalEnergies reported a 14.6% rise in second-quarter earnings, below analyst expectations, as higher oil prices lifted crude sales and offset weaker refined product and gas sales.】

item.title: 沃达丰第一季度增长放缓，德国市场下滑
item.description: 沃达丰第一季度的服务收入增长了 5.4%，与前三个季度相比有所放缓，原因是其最大的市场德国因有线电视法规的变化而陷入逆境。【原文：Vodafone reported a 5.4% rise in service revenue in the first quarter, a slowdown on the previous three quarters, after its biggest market Germany went into reverse due to changes in cable TV regulation.】

item.title: 联合利华第二季度基本销售额增长不及预期
item.description: 联合利华（Unilever）周四公布的基本季度销售额低于预期，因为该公司无法赢回近年来因提高价格而疏远的购物者。【原文：Unilever on Thursday reported worse-than-expected underlying quarterly sales after it was unable to win back shoppers it had alienated in recent years with higher prices.】

item.title: 阿斯利康上调全年业绩展望，因治疗需求乐观
item.description: 盎格鲁-瑞典制药商阿斯利康公司周四上调了2024年的销售和利润预期，受癌症和罕见病治疗需求的推动，其第二季度收入超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Anglo-Swedish drugmaker AstraZeneca on Thursday raised its sales and profit forecast for 2024 and topped analyst expectations for second-quarter revenue, buoyed by demand for its therapies for cancer and rare diseases.】

item.title: 澳大利亚法官驳回声称拜耳公司的驱集除草剂致癌的诉讼
item.description: 澳大利亚一名法官周四表示，拜耳公司的 "Roundup "除草剂中的一种成分会增加使用者患癌症的风险，这一点尚未得到证实。【原文：An Australian judge said on Thursday it was not proven that an ingredient in Bayer's Roundup weedkiller increases the risk of cancer in users.】

item.title: 日产汽车第一季度利润下降 99%，股价遭重挫
item.description: 日本日产汽车公司周四公布，由于美国市场销售表现疲软，其第一季度营业利润下降了 99%，因此该公司下调了其年度业绩展望，导致其股价大幅下跌。【原文：Japan's Nissan Motor slashed its annual outlook after posting a 99% decline in first-quarter operating profit due to weak U.S. sales performance on Thursday, sending its shares sharply lower.】

item.title: 第二季度盈利强劲，赛诺菲上调全年业绩预期
item.description: 赛诺菲第二季度利润增长了 3.2%，原因是对其哮喘治疗药物 Dupixent 的需求强劲，以及新上市药物的销售好于预期。【原文：Sanofi's second-quarter profit rose 3.2% on strong demand for its blockbuster asthma drug Dupixent and better-than-expected sales of new launches, with the company now expecting a stable full-year profit compared to a prior forecast of a fall.】

item.title: 瑞士护肤品公司 Galderma 销售额强劲增长，前景乐观
item.description: 瑞士高德美公司（Galderma）周四表示，在所有产品类别销量增长的推动下，2024 年上半年按固定汇率计算的净销售额增长了 10.8%，这促使这家护肤品公司对其前景作出了乐观的展望。【原文：Switzerland's Galderma on Thursday said net sales rose 10.8% on a constant currency basis in the first half of 2024, driven by volume growth in all product categories, prompting the skin care company to give an upbeat outlook on its prospects.】

item.title: 瑞士宝盛私人银行上半年利润下降 15
item.description: 瑞士宝盛私人银行周四报告称，2024 年上半年利润下降了 15%，在这一动荡时期，其首席执行官因数百万美元的 Signa 债务而离职。【原文：Swiss private bank Julius Baer on Thursday reported a 15% drop in profit for first half of 2024, a tumultuous period that saw the exit of its CEO in the wake of the multi-million Signa debacle.】

item.title: Corona Cero 的奥运赌注加剧了零酒精啤酒领域的竞争
item.description: 安海斯-布希-英博公司（Anheuser-Busch InBev）将奥运赞助作为赌注，以帮助其新啤酒 Corona Cero 成为全球最畅销的零酒精啤酒，但它需要赶上喜力 0.0 等竞争对手，喜力 0.0 在主要市场上处于领先地位。【原文：Anheuser-Busch InBev is betting on Olympic sponsorship to help its new Corona Cero brew become a top-selling zero-alcohol beer globally, but it will need to catch up with rivals like Heineken 0.0, a leading player in major markets.】

item.title: 雀巢下调全年指导价格，原因是价格下跌速度快于预期
item.description: 雀巢公司周四公布的半年销售增长低于分析师的预测，并将全年有机销售增长指导从之前的约 4% 下调至至少 3%。【原文：Nestle reported half-year sales growth below analysts' forecasts on Thursday and lowered its full-year organic sales growth guidance to at least 3% from about 4% previously.】

item.title: 巨型股大跌表明投资者担心科技股过多
item.description: 今年以来推动市场走高的权重股出现暴跌，凸显了华尔街在大型科技股的任何疲软面前的脆弱性，并引发了人们对过度膨胀的股市将面临更多动荡的担忧。【原文：A tumble in the heavyweight stocks that have powered markets higher this year is highlighting Wall Street's vulnerability to any weakness in the Big Tech trade and causing concerns that over-stretched stocks are in for more turbulence.】

item.title: 早间投标股市溃败波及科技以外领域
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 市场分析师对中国意外降息的反应
item.description: 周四，中国出人意料地下调了银行融资成本。在宣布将一年期中期借贷便利（MLF）下调20个基点后，股市下跌，债券反弹。【原文：China surprised financial markets with an off-cycle cut to bank funding costs on Thursday. Stocks fell and bonds rallied after the announcement of a 20 basis point reduction in the one-year medium-term lending facility (MLF) .】

item.title: 日本政府维持经济评估，下调出口评级
item.description: 日本政府周四维持了对经济的评估，但由于中国需求放缓的影响，对出口的看法比上个月更加暗淡。【原文：Japan's government on Thursday maintained its assessment on the economy but offered a bleaker view than last month on exports due to the fallout from slowing Chinese demand.】

item.title: 泰国 6 月汽车产量大幅下降，当地销量下滑
item.description: 泰国工业联合会（FTI）周四表示，由于融资规则收紧和消费者债务高企，泰国 6 月份的汽车产量同比下降了 20.11%，目前预计全年产量将低于 2023 年。【原文：Car production in Thailand fell 20.11% in June from a year earlier due to tighter financing rules and high consumer debt, and full-year production is now expected to be lower than in 2023, the Federation of Thai Industries (FTI) said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国第二季度经济增长回升，通胀消退
item.description: 在稳健的消费支出和库存增加的刺激下，美国第二季度的经济增长可能有所加快，但经济扩张的步伐仍会使人们对美联储 9 月份降息的预期保持不变。【原文：U.S. economic growth likely picked up in the second quarter, spurred by solid consumer spending and inventory building, but the pace of expansion should still leave expectations of a September interest rate cut from the Federal Reserve intact.】

item.title: 中国央行出人意料地再次降低贷款利率
item.description: 中国央行本周第二次出乎市场意料，于周四以大幅下调利率的方式进行了一次计划外贷款操作，这表明当局正试图提供更强有力的货币刺激措施来支撑经济。【原文：China's central bank surprised markets for a second time this week by conducting an unscheduled lending operation on Thursday at steeply lower rates, suggesting authorities are trying to provide heavier monetary stimulus to prop up the economy.】

item.title: 科技股暴跌打击亚洲股市，日元站上 2 个半月高位
item.description: 由于全球科技股暴跌，投资者纷纷逃往风险较低的资产，包括短期债券、日元和瑞士法郎，周四亚洲股市遭受重创。【原文：Asian shares were hammered on Thursday as a slump in global tech stocks sent investors fleeing into less risky assets, including short-dated bonds, the yen and Swiss franc.】

item.title: 医疗保健公司 Concentra 在美国上市，估值近 30 亿美元
item.description: 美国医疗保健公司 Concentra Group 周三表示，其美国首次公开募股（IPO）的定价为 29.7 亿美元。【原文：Concentra Group set the pricing of its U.S. initial public offering (IPO) at a valuation of $2.97 billion, the U.S. healthcare firm said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国央行意外开展中期贷款操作并降息
item.description: 继本周早些时候连续降息之后，中国央行周四意外进行了中期借贷便利（MLF）操作并降息。【原文：China's central bank unexpectedly conducted a medium-term lending facility (MLF) operation on Thursday and cut the interest rate, following a string of other rate reductions earlier this week.】

item.title: 因担忧中国需求疲软和中东停火谈判，油价有所回落
item.description: 油价周四有所回落，原因是对全球最大原油进口国中国需求疲软的担忧，以及对中东即将达成停火协议的预期，压制了上一交易日美国库存减少后的涨势。【原文：Oil prices eased on Thursday as concerns over weak demand in China, the world's largest crude importer, and expectations of a nearing ceasefire deal in the Middle East overcame gains in the previous session after draws in U.S. inventories.】

item.title: 利差交易平仓，风险情绪受挫，日元上涨
item.description: 周四，在日本央行（BOJ）下周政策会议召开之前，套利交易平仓为日元提供了支撑，同时，大盘成长股的轮动也广泛抑制了风险偏好，并提供了一些避险买盘。【原文：The yen drew support from unwinding carry trades on Thursday ahead of next week's Bank of Japan (BOJ) policy meeting and as a rotation out of megacap growth stocks dampened risk appetite broadly and provided some safe haven bids.】

item.title: 电池公司 LG Energy Solution 第二季度利润因电动汽车需求疲软而大幅下滑
item.description: 韩国电池公司 LG Energy Solution（LGES）周四公布，受电池驱动的电动汽车（EV）需求减弱的影响，该公司季度利润下降了 58%。【原文：South Korean battery firm LG Energy Solution (LGES) posted on Thursday a 58% drop in quarterly profit, hit by weakening demand for battery-powered electric vehicles (EVs).】

item.title: 据《纽约时报》报道，默多克与子女就继承权问题打官司
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周三报道，传媒大亨鲁珀特-默多克（Rupert Murdoch）正在与他的三个子女打官司，以确保他的长子、也是他选定的接班人拉克兰-默多克（Lachlan Murdoch）将继续掌管他的传媒帝国。【原文：Media mogul Rupert Murdoch is engaged in a legal battle against three of his children to ensure that his eldest son and chosen successor, Lachlan Murdoch, will remain in charge of his media empire, the New York Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国主要银行在贷款利率下调后下调存款利率
item.description: 中国五大国有银行周四表示将下调存款利率，几天前，中国出人意料地下调了基准贷款利率，以促进陷入困境的经济增长。【原文：Five of China's major state-owned banks said on Thursday they would cut deposit rates, days after the country surprised markets by lowering benchmark lending rates to bolster growth in a struggling economy.】

item.title: 澳新银行对债券交易指控的初步分析没有发现操纵市场的证据
item.description: 澳大利亚澳新银行集团（ANZ Group）周四表示，该集团对围绕 2023 年 10 年期国债发行执行情况的调查进行了初步分析，未发现任何操纵市场的证据。【原文：Australia's ANZ Group said on Thursday its own preliminary analysis of the investigation around the execution of a 2023 issuance of 10-year treasury bonds has not found any evidence of market manipulation.】

item.title: 英伟达供应商 SK 海力士第二季度利润因人工智能热潮而飙升
item.description: 韩国 SK 海力士（SK Hynix）周四公布了 2018 年以来最高的季度利润，原因是这家英伟达（Nvidia）供应商的先进 DRAM 芯片（如用于生成式人工智能芯片组的高带宽内存（HBM））销售火爆。【原文：South Korea's SK Hynix posted on Thursday its highest quarterly profit since 2018 as the Nvidia supplier sees explosive sales of its advanced DRAM chips such as high bandwidth memory (HBM) used in generative AI chipsets.】
